## MapView.clearTileCache() method

Clear the tile cache.

Remove the \[\[Tile\]\] objects created by cacheable \[\[DataSource\]\]s. If a \[\[DataSource\]\] name is provided, this method restricts the eviction the \[\[DataSource\]\] with the given name.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clearTileCache(dataSourceName?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dataSourceName | string | The name of the \[\[DataSource\]\]. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
